name: South Park Season 24
info:
• 中文名: 南方公园 第24季
  • 话数: 2
  • 放送开始: 2020年9月30日
  • 官方网站: https://www.southparkstudios.com/
  • 播放电视台: Comedy Central
  • 导演: Trey Parker
  • 脚本: Trey Parker, Matt Stone
  • 人物和背景美术: David Brown, Ramiro Cazaux, George Holguin, Shaina Reyes
  • 音乐: Jamie Dunlap

eps.name: The Pandemic Special
eps.desc: Randy comes to terms with his role in the COVID-19 outbreak as the on-going pandemic presents continued challenges to the citizens of South Park. The kids happily head back to school but nothing resembles the normal that they once knew; not their teachers, not their homeroom, not even Eric Cartman.

eps.name: South ParQ Vaccination Special
eps.desc: The citizens of South ParQ are clamoring for the COVID-19 vaccine. A hilarious new militant group tries to stop the boys from getting their teacher vaccinated.
